divs: Sighting Detailsi was looking in the sky at what i thought was a very bright star. the object was hovering and suddenly started moving than stopped again. i ran to get my cell phone and got video of it. the craft changed directions at amazing angles creating tons of g force. im not saying this is alien craft or military. i do not know what it was. herea the video
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cranesville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: on august fifth i was looking out of my bedroom window and observed this craft in the sky
